definition: south of the five ranges/old term for south China, esp. Guangdong and Guangxi
mountain range/mountain ridge
south
surname Nan

sentences.english: Madame Xian Tai was the chief of the Baiyue ethnic group in the Lingnan region.
sentences.chinese: 冼夫人是岭南百越族的一位首领。

sentences.english: From the historical perspective, there is a staged meaning that the Nanyue Kingdom explored the Lingnan region.
sentences.chinese: 从历史上看，南越王国对岭南开发有着阶段性的意义。

sentences.english: Taishan is well known as the hometown of overseas Chinese in Southern China.
sentences.chinese: 台山是我国岭南著名的华侨之乡。

sentences.english: The west garden in Liuhua Park is a famous miniascape garden and one of the excellence Lingnan Gardens.
sentences.chinese: 流花西苑是广州著名的盆景园，也是岭南园林的精品。

sentences.english: In a word. East River Region was the economic barycenter of Lingnan in Eastern Zhou Period.
sentences.chinese: 归纳之，东周时期东江流域是岭南的经济重心。

sentences.english: It can be said that The Xielu Villa can be a window to display the Lingnan culture.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，谢鲁山庄开启的是一扇展示岭南文化的窗口。

sentences.english: Guangdong and Gungxi both belong to Lingnan Cultural Area.
sentences.chinese: 广东广西本属岭南文化区。

sentences.english: This is also one of the main characteristics of Lingnan culture.
sentences.chinese: 世俗性这也是岭南文化主要特征之一。

sentences.english: The southern Cantonese culture is a separate cultural entity.
sentences.chinese: 岭南文化是一单独的文化实体。

sentences.english: Nanyue Kingdom was an important regional regime in Lingnan in late Qin and early Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 南越国是秦末汉初存在于岭南地区的重要地方政权。

sentences.english: The following information is provided by Lingnan University and posted by Student Affairs Section.
sentences.chinese: 以下资料由岭南大学提供，学生事务处代传。

sentences.english: Nanhan Dynasty is short, but it still affected the development of the Ling Nan area.
sentences.chinese: 南汉统治的时间虽短，但对岭南地区的开发仍有影响。

sentences.english: There were five climaxes of immigration to Lingnan in history.
sentences.chinese: 历史上先后有五次移民岭南的高潮。

sentences.english: That program, CHEMBA (China Executive MBA in Guangzhou, China), is offered through a partnership between the Carlson School and Lingnan (University) College.
sentences.chinese: 该项目由卡尔森管理学院和岭南学院合作办学。

sentences.english: Secularity This is also one of the main characteristics of Lingnan culture.
sentences.chinese: 世俗性这也是岭南文化主要特征之一。

sentences.english: Banana is one of the four shaddock are lingnan.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉是岭南四大名果之一。

definition: the two provinces of Guangdong and Guangxi (traditional)
Yangcheng, a nickname for 廣州|广州[Guang3 zhou1]
Central Plain, the middle and lower regions of the Yellow river, including Henan, western Shandong, southern Shanxi and Hebei
Lianzhou county level city in Qingyuan 清远, Guangdong
Sichuan/originally two provinces of Qin and Han
Qingyuan prefecture level city in Guangdong
Xijiang River
Leizhou county level city in Zhanjiang 湛江[Zhan4 jiang1], Guangdong
Dongjiang River

south of Changjiang or Yangtze river/south of the lower reaches of Changjiang/often refers to south Jiangsu, south Anhui and north Zhejiang provinces/a province during Qing times/in literature, refers to the sunny south/Gangnam (district in Seoul, South Korea)
Chaozhou prefecture-level city in Guangdong 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3]/Chaochou town in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Wuzhou prefecture level city in Guangxi
Nanchou township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区 in South Central China, on the border with Vietnam, abbr. 桂, capital Nanning 南寧|南宁/until 1959, Guangxi province
Qiongzhou, historic name for Hainan Island 海南島|海南岛[Hai3 nan2 Dao3]
Baiyue, generic term for southern ethnic groups/also written 百越
